dc_title_s: CAL FIRE Non-Industrial Timber Management Plans (NTMPS), 1991-2019
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains information related to non-industrial timber management plans (NTMPs) in California. Source: USGS DLG and digitized base data captured at 1:24,000 augmented with features digitized at 1:5,000 or better; boundaries and feature representations of the record derived from Non-Industrial Timber Management Plans (NTMPs)
